verbs.description: russia marks anniversary of 1941 military parade [ARG0: thousands of troops in world war ii uniform] [V: marched] [ARGM-DIR: across moscow red square] [ARGM-TMP: on wednesday] in a re - enactment of a historic wartime parade on nov 7 1941 red army soldiers marched directly to the front line during the battle of moscow to repel the invading nazi forces closing in on the soviet capital moscow mayor sergei sobyanin said the 1941 parade was a symbol of courage and faith paving way for the first difficult step toward victory over the nazis parade st basil cathedral moscow sergey sobyanin red army red square sergei sobyanin soviet union st basils cathedral spasskaya tower st basil cathedral st basil cathedral military military parade russia
